net.jordaria.event

Class HandlerList

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jordaria.event.HandlerList

  • public class HandlerList
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores handlers per event. Based on lahwran's fevents.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HandlerList()
      Create a new handler list and initialize using an EventPriority.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bake()
      Bake HashMap and ArrayLists to 2d array - does nothing if not necessary
      static void bakeAll()
      Bake all handler lists.
      static java.util.ArrayList<HandlerList> getHandlerLists()
      Get a list of all handler lists for every event type.
      EventListener[] getRegisteredListeners()
      Get the baked registered listeners associated with this handler list
      void register(EventListener listener)
      Register a new listener in this handler list.
      void registerAll(java.util.Collection<EventListener> listeners)
      Register a collection of new listeners in this handler list.
      void unregister(EventListener listener)
      Remove a listener from a specific order slot.
      void unregister(Listener listener)
      Remove a specific listener from this handler
      static void unregisterAll()
      Unregisters all handlers
      static void unregisterAll(Listener listener)
      Unregister a specific listener from all handler lists.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • HandlerList

        public HandlerList()
        Create a new handler list and initialize using an EventPriority. The HandlerList is then added to meta-list for use in bakeAll().

    • Method Detail

      • bakeAll

        public static void bakeAll()
        Bake all handler lists. Best used just after all normal event registration is complete.

      • unregisterAll

        public static void unregisterAll()
        Unregisters all handlers

      • unregisterAll

        public static void unregisterAll(Listener listener)
        Unregister a specific listener from all handler lists.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to unregister

      • register

        public void register(EventListener listener)
        Register a new listener in this handler list.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to register

      • registerAll

        public void registerAll(java.util.Collection<EventListener> listeners)
        Register a collection of new listeners in this handler list.
        Parameters:
        listeners - The collection to register

      • unregister

        public void unregister(EventListener listener)
        Remove a listener from a specific order slot.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to unregister

      • unregister

        public void unregister(Listener listener)
        Remove a specific listener from this handler

      • bake

        public void bake()
        Bake HashMap and ArrayLists to 2d array - does nothing if not necessary

      • getRegisteredListeners

        public EventListener[] getRegisteredListeners()
        Get the baked registered listeners associated with this handler list
        Returns:
        The listeners registered

      • getHandlerLists

        public static java.util.ArrayList<HandlerList> getHandlerLists()
        Get a list of all handler lists for every event type.
        Returns:
        The list of all handler lists
